game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifacts from the lost temple.
game.description: Seek out the entrance to the lost temple and navigate through its treacherous traps. Once inside, retrieve the three ancient artifacts: the Golden Chalice, the Scepter of Light, and the Amulet of Protection.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a legendary sword

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple
tasks.description: Seek out the ancient maps in Eilif's hut and decipher their cryptic symbols. The entrance lies hidden behind a waterfall.
tasks.location: The old growth forest, near the village

tasks.description: Use your wits to disable the deadly traps and reach the first chamber. A hidden pressure plate will unlock the door.
tasks.location: The lost temple, inside the entrance

tasks.description: Solve the riddle on the wall to reveal a hidden compartment containing the chalice.
tasks.location: The first chamber of the lost temple
